contentList.content: Sword Dancer

Specialized clerics of the Dark Maiden were known as Sword Dancers. They were excellent dancers and spellsingers, known to use an agile and acrobatic fencing style resembling a dance. The sword dancers led missions to find, assist, and protect any drow looking to return to the surface (or that could be made to return) and embrace a different life. They were skilled diplomats, especially active near the settlements of elves and other races, working to establish peace and cooperation between drow and surface dwellers.
Silverhair Knight

The Silverhair Knights were an order of clerics of Eilistraee completely dedicated to the redemption and subsequent protection of drow followers of Lolth, Vhaeraun, and other deities of the Dark Seldarine. They fully embraced the teaching of Eilistraee about showing mercy and compassion, and fought these dark elves only using non-lethal means, hoping to make them understand the error of their ways and choose a different life. Like the Sword Dancers, they often embarked on missions within Lolthite settlements, aiming to find and rescue drow who were in danger or seeking an alternative.
Darksong Knight

The Darksong Knights were an elite order of Eilistraeeans, mostly active in the South, beneath the lands of ancient Ilythiir. Each member of this order was a battle-priest who chose to devote their life not only to furthering the Dark Maiden's goals, but also to the destruction of yochlol and other demons and minions of Lolth, for they were the cause of the corruption and fall of the drow people.
Protector Of The Song

The Protectors of the Song were the temple guards of the Promenade of the Dark Maiden, the main center of worship of Eilistraee on Faer√ªn. Their main duty was to protect the temple and patrol the area around the Pit of Ghaunadaur, to prevent the return of the slime god.
Eilistraean Footwork

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

The bonus on hit damage starts at 0 and increases by [1] every 5 levels.

Ritually bind the weapon in your main hand. The weapon can't be knocked out of your hand, and it automatically returns to you when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Thrown</LSTag>.

Ritually bound to its wielder.

The weapon can't be knocked out of the wielder's hand, and automatically returns to the wielder when Thrown.
Eilistraean Song Charge

Charges that can be accumulated for the Eilistraean Song Climax while Eilistraean Singing. Attacking with a weapon grants a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="EILISTRAEAN_CHARGE">Eilistraean Song Charge</LSTag>. In addition to gaining Eilistraean Song Slot Slots.

Unleash the full damaging and healing effects of your Eilistraean Song at once. Your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="EILISTRAEAN_CHARGE">Eilistraean Song Charges</LSTag> will harm enemies an additional [1], and will heal you and your allies an additional [2].

If it is higher level than [1], you must make a <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">check</LSTag> to prevent it. The check's difficulty is equal to [2] plus the level of the spell you are trying to counter.

Invoke the Eilistraean Blade Song. You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [2]. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> in Acrobatics and a +[1] bonus to Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Attack</LSTag> increases by [2]. Invoke the Eilistraean War Rhythm. You gain a +[1] bonus to your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MainHandAttack">MainHand Attack</LSTag>. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> in Athletics and a +[2] bonus to Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. You are immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYSED">Paralysed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Eilistraean Spell Song

Invoke the Eilistraean Spell Song. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> in Performance and a +[1] bonus to Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. You also gain a +[1] bonus to Wisdom and Charisma. You are immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYSED">Paralysed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>

Can burn a nearby enemy with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MoonFireBladeExtra">Spread Moon Fire Blade</LSTag>. Removed if you move.
You gain an additional way to use your Sneak Attack; You can now also perform sneak attacks if there are no other enemies within [1] of the target (the enemy is isolated).
Reactions, such as <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>, are responses you can have to events. Reactions can trigger both during and outside of your turn.

Your confidence propels you into battle. You can give yourself a bonus to your initiative rolls equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>
Attack Cantrip Helper
Summon blades to sweep at creatures within [1] of you.
Hide from enemies by succeeding <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth checks</LSTag>. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.
Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space [1] away you can see.

Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space [1] away you can see. Afterwards, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space [1] away you can see. Afterwards, A Cloud of Darkness is formed around you and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space [1] away you can see. Afterwards, A Cloud of Darkness is formed around you and all enemies take psychic damage. You also have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Shadow Strike

A charge that will increase how much damage you deal to enemies by [1] and how much you heal yourself and your allies by [1] when using Eilistraean Song Climax.

You can accumulate these charges by attacking with weapons.
Use this resource to cast Spell Songs during combat
Moon Fire Burn

Create [1] illusory duplicates of yourself that distract attackers. Each duplicate increases your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> to [2]. Attackers have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you.
You can't use this attack if you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour and in the Performance skill. You also gain Proficiency with Daggers, Sickles, Shortswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, and Longswords.
The mirror image distracts attackers, increasing the spellcaster's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 3. When the caster successfully evades an attack, one of the images disappears.
Eilistraean Counter Success

Insult a creature: it has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>. Targets allies within [1] new to make a save or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> with laughter, without the ability to get up.
Eilistraean Cunning
All the time spent practicing with blades, spells and sleight of hand has paid off. You gain an additional bonus and reaction action.

You conjure [2] shards of concentrated moonlight and send them streaking toward targets within range. Each shard always hits and deals [1].
Spellsong: Song of Hope
Spellsong: Song of Life
Spellsong: Song of Rapture
Improved Lunar Smite
You touch a creature and stimulate its natural healing ability. The target regains [1] + [3]. For the duration of the spell, the target regains [2] at the start of each of its turns.
Spellsong: Song of Renewal

You channel the fury of Eilistraee on Fiends, weakening their very essence. Magic that would normally bounce off its form now burns its flesh. All Darksong spells and attacks will ignore any <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> the target has to all damage types.

You channel the fury of Eilistraee on Oozes, weakening their very essence. Magic that would normally bounce off its form now burns its flesh. All Darksong spells and attacks will ignore any <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> the target has to all damage types.

Using a 4th-level spell slot, you cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SDOE_SongOfProtection_Sanctuary">Spellsong: Sanctuary</LSTag> on 2 targets within 10m. At 5th level, you may instead cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SDOE_SongOfProtection_Deathward">Spellsong: Death Ward</LSTag> on a single creature within 10m. At 8th level, you may cast Spellsong: Death Ward on up to 4 targets.
Wrap yourself in silvery moonlight and vanish, reappearing in an unoccupied space within 18m.
Remove Curses and Hexes on up to [1] Creatures or Objects afflicted by them within 6m.
Creature is engulfed by Eilistraee's Moonlight that deal [1] and [2] per turn. On a successful save, the creature still takes half damage.
Lunar Smite
Lunar Smite: Reaction

Perform an inspiring melody that affects up to [1] of creatures within 10m who can hear you. Affected allies gain advantage on saving throws against being Charmed or Frightened, a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> equal to your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, and a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> equal to half your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. Lasts for 10 turns while you maintain concentration.
Lunar Smite Critical: Reaction

You conjure strands of moonlight in the form of elven spirits that embrace and heal your allies. Choose up to 6 creatures within 10m who can hear you, each target is healed for [1] plus your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. The healing increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 4th.
Move Eilistraee's Moonlight up to [1]. The Moonlight damages any creature [2] and [3] that enters it or starts its turn inside.
Aura of Purity
Protect up to [1] targets, they cannot be targeted until attacking or harming another creature but can still take damage from area spells.
Fire a bolt of concentrated moonlight at a target, dealing [1] and [2] and leaving a frozen surface at the point of impact.
Lunar Shift
Prismatic Spray
Protect up to [1] creatures from death. The next time damage would reduce them to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, they remain conscious with 1 hit point left.
Spellsong: Song of Protection
Eilistraee's Moonlight engulfs any creature that enters this silvery light or starts its turn inside it. They take [1] and [2]. On a successful save, targets still take half damage.
Strike your foe with Eilistraee's divine power, channeling both the radiant brilliance and frigid grace of the moon dealing [1] and [2]. The [3] increases by [4] when attacking Fiends or Undead.
Spellsong: Sanctuary
Moonveil Strike
Moonlight Shards
Spellsong: Lesser Restoration
Move Moonlight
Lunar Bolt
Eternal Dance
Bladesong Waltz

You perform a haunting melody that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED ">Charms</LSTag> nearby foes and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED ">Incapacitates</LSTag> all creatures within 10m who fail a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, including those who enter the area later. Affected targets cannot be charmed again by this spell more than once, you cannot take actions while performing and moving will break concentration.

Empower yourself with the grace of the Dark Maiden, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next weapon attack, it deals an additional [1] and [2] on a hit and you do not provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>. Whether you hit or miss, your walking speed increases by 9m until the end of that turn.
Moonlit Sanctuary
Cure up to [1] creatures from disease, poison, paralysis or blindness within 9m.

You become so attuned to Eilistraee's own dance and song, that all your movements are cloaked in unearthly grace. You ignore effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag> and if a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, it deals no damage if you succeed, and only half damage if you fail.
Spellsong: Remove Curse
Aura of Truth
Oozebane
Demonbane

You teleport between up to 5 enemies within range, dancing through them in a flurry of strikes. Each hit channels Eilistraee's will, dealing [1] and [2] and you reappear beside the final target, your form trailing glimmers of moonlight.

Six multicolored rays of light flash from your hand. Each creature in a 18m cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. For each target, roll a d6 to determine the effect.

On roll of 1: [1], on 2: [2], on 3: [3], on 4: [4], on 5: [5] and half as much on a failed save. On a 6 and a failed save, the target is Blinded. It must then make a Wisdom saving throw at the start of your next turn. A successful save ends the blindness. If it fails that save, the creature is Banished for 4 turns.

Conjure a 4m radius circle of silvery moonlight that lasts for 3 turns. Allies inside restore [1] each turn, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic and Psychic damage. Targets cannot become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> and Invisibility is removed while inside.

Using a 4th-level spell slot you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SDOE_Spellsong_SongOfRenewal_RemoveCurse">Spellsong: Remove Curse</LSTag> within 9m. At 5th level, you may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SDOE_Spellsong_AuraOfPurity">Spellsong: Aura of Purity</LSTag> and at 6th level, you may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SDOE_Spellsong_SongOfRenewal_Restoration">Spellsong: Lesser Restoration</LSTag> on up to 3 targets within 6m.
Your attacks are suffused with Eilistraee's Divine Moonlight dealing an additional [1] and [2].
Regenerate

Purifying energy radiates from you in an aura with a 9m radius. You and allies are <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Disease, <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag>, gain an <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyzed</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> status effects.
Spellsong: Death Ward
Spellsong: Aura of Purity
Protect a creature from death. The next time damage would reduce it to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it remains conscious with 1 hit point left.
Eilistraee's Moonlight

You and any nearby allies within 3m can see through magical and non-magical darkness, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>. In addition, gain a bonus to Insight and Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> based on your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious.
You call down a pillar of moonlit grace infused with the divine presence of the Dark Maiden. All creatures within the area take [2] and [3]. You can use an action to move it [1].
